body_html:
Apparently a similar error arises with tf.feature_column.numeric_column when inputs have dtype int.

Here is an example:

a = np.reshape(np.arange(12), (12, 1))
with tf.Session() as sess:
    a_t = tf.constant(a)
    seq_cols = tf.feature_column.numeric_column('test', default_value=.0, normalizer_fn=lambda x: (x - 2.) / .3)
    seq_features = tf.feature_column.input_layer({'test': a_t}, [seq_cols])

    b = sess.run(seq_features)

Interestingly changing the above snippet with

a = np.reshape(np.arange(12, dtype=np.float32), (3, 4, 1))

solve the issue on tf.feature_column.numeric_column but surprisingly not with tf.contrib.feature_column.sequence_numeric_column

Apparently a similar error arises with tf.feature_column.numeric_column when inputs have dtype int.
Here is an example:
a = np.reshape(np.arange(12), (12, 1))
with tf.Session() as sess:
    a_t = tf.constant(a)
    seq_cols = tf.feature_column.numeric_column('test', default_value=.0, normalizer_fn=lambda x: (x - 2.) / .3)
    seq_features = tf.feature_column.input_layer({'test': a_t}, [seq_cols])

    b = sess.run(seq_features)

Interestingly changing the above snippet with
a = np.reshape(np.arange(12, dtype=np.float32), (3, 4, 1))
solve the issue on tf.feature_column.numeric_column but surprisingly not with tf.contrib.feature_column.sequence_numeric_column
body:
Apparently a similar error arises with `tf.feature_column.numeric_column` when inputs have dtype `int`.

Here is an example:

```
a = np.reshape(np.arange(12), (12, 1))
with tf.Session() as sess:
    a_t = tf.constant(a)
    seq_cols = tf.feature_column.numeric_column('test', default_value=.0, normalizer_fn=lambda x: (x - 2.) / .3)
    seq_features = tf.feature_column.input_layer({'test': a_t}, [seq_cols])

    b = sess.run(seq_features)
```

Interestingly changing the above snippet with 

`a = np.reshape(np.arange(12, dtype=np.float32), (3, 4, 1))`

solve the issue on `tf.feature_column.numeric_column` but surprisingly not with `tf.contrib.feature_column.sequence_numeric_column`
